freenet.client.async
Interface ClientBaseCallback

All Known Subinterfaces:
ClientCallback, ClientGetCallback, ClientPutCallback
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientGet, ClientPut, ClientPutBase, ClientPutDir, ExtJarUpdater, FetchWaiter, FProxyFetchInProgress, MainJarUpdater, NodeARKInserter, NodeUpdater, NullClientCallback, PluginJarUpdater, PutWaiter, RevocationChecker, TransferThread
public interface ClientBaseCallback

A client process. Something that initiates requests, and can cancel them. FCP, FProxy, and the GlobalPersistentClient, implement this somewhere.

Method Summary
 void onMajorProgress(com.db4o.ObjectContainer container)
          Called when freenet.async thinks that the request should be serialized to disk, if it is a persistent request.
 

Method Detail
